title: int_1129
author: int_1129
content: Introducing APEPEPOW - the cryptocurrency project that prioritizes FUN above all else, while revolutionizing mining with the Memehash algorithm, specifically designed for the meme-loving community of Monero (XMR)!⠀⠀⢀⣠⠤⠶⠖⠒⠒⠶⠦⠤⣄⠀⠀⠀⣀⡤⠤⠤⠤⠤⣄⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣴⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠙⣦⠞⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠳⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡾⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣘⡆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⣆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⡴⠚⠉⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠉⠙⠲⣄⣤⠤⠶⠒⠒⠲⠦⢤⣜⣧⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠳⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠳⢄⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⠹⣆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⣀⣀⣹⣄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣠⠞⣉⣡⠤⠴⠿⠗⠳⠶⣬⣙⠓⢦⡈⠙⢿⡀⠀⠀⢀⣼⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⣷⣤⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣾⣡⠞⣁⣀⣀⣀⣠⣤⣤⣤⣄⣭⣷⣦⣽⣦⡀⢻⡄⠰⢟⣥⣾⣿⣏⣉⡙⠓⢦⣻⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠉⠙⠻⢤⣄⣼⣿⣽⣿⠟⠻⣿⠄⠀⠀⢻⡝⢿⡇⣠⣿⣿⣻⣿⠿⣿⡉⠓⠮⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⢦⡈⠛⠿⣾⣿⣶⣾⡿⠀⠀⠀⢀⣳⣘⢻⣇⣿⣿⣽⣿⣶⣾⠃⣀⡴⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⠲⠤⢄⣈⣉⣙⣓⣒⣒⣚⣉⣥⠟⠀⢯⣉⡉⠉⠉⠛⢉⣉⣡⡾⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣠⣤⡤⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢈⡿⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠻⣍⠉⠀⠺⠿⠋⠙⣦⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⣥⣤⠴⠆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⣠⠤⠖⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠳⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⣧⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⢫⡟⠙⣛⠲⠤⣄⣀⣀⠀⠈⠋⠉⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣠⠏⣨⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠻⢦⣈⠓⠶⠤⣄⣉⠉⠉⠛⠒⠲⠦⠤⠤⣤⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣠⠴⢋⡴⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠓⠦⣄⡀⠈⠙⠓⠒⠶⠶⠶⠶⠤⣤⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣉⣉⣉⣉⣉⣀⣠⠴⠋⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠓⠦⣄⣀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⡼⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠉⠙⠛⠒⠒⠒⠒⠒⠤⠤⠤⠒⠒⠒⠒⠒⠒⠚⢉⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣠⠴⠚⠛⠳⣤⠞⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣤⠚⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⠲⣄⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣴⠋⠙⢷⡋⢙⡇⢀⡴⢒⡿⢶⣄⡴⠀⠙⠳⣄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⢦⡀⠈⠛⢻⠛⢉⡴⣋⡴⠟⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⢧⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢻⡄⠀⠘⣶⢋⡞⠁⠀⠀⢀⡴⠂⠀⠀⠀⠀⠹⣄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⠈⠻⢦⡀⠀⣰⠏⠀⠀⢀⡴⠃⢀⡄⠙⣆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⡾⢷⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠙⠯⠀⠀⡴⠋⠀⢠⠟⠀⠀⢹⡄APEPEPOW is all about injecting joy and amusement into the world of cryptocurrencies. We believe that having a good time shouldn't be sacrificed for serious business, especially when it comes to innovative digital assets like Monero.Here's what APEPEPOW has to offer:FUN First: We put the fun back into cryptocurrencies! APEPEPOW focuses on creating an entertaining and light-hearted environment for all community members. With exciting events, challenges, and gamified experiences, we ensure that FUN is at the heart of everything we do.Memehash Mining Algorithm: Say goodbye to traditional mining algorithms! APEPEPOW introduces the groundbreaking Memehash algorithm, designed to reward miners for their memetic prowess. The algorithm evaluates the creativity and humor of submitted memes, making mining an enjoyable and hilarious experience.NFTs for Memes: We're taking memes to the next level with NFTs! APEPEPOW enables you to create, trade, and collect unique meme-inspired NFTs. These digital collectibles represent the humor and artistry of our community, allowing you to truly own and cherish your favorite memes.Community Engagement: APEPEPOW thrives on community participation. We actively encourage our community members to unleash their creativity and contribute their best memes. Engage with fellow meme enthusiasts, participate in meme contests, and help us build a vibrant and entertaining ecosystem together. Innovation and Utility: While FUN is our primary focus, APEPEPOW also strives for innovation and utility. We explore creative ways to leverage the Monero ecosystem and contribute to its growth. We're committed to pushing the boundaries of what's possible while maintaining the essence of laughter and enjoyment.Join APEPEPOW and become a part of the most entertaining cryptocurrency movement in the world! Unleash your meme-making skills, mine with Memehash, and let's make Monero fun like never before.Join our discord - https://discord.gg/U6bEy2zN25https://github.com/APEPEPOW/APEPEPOW

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: matejbilahora on June 16, 2023, 08:36:46 PMIs this project dead or what? Discord is not reachable and website is also gone..I was curious about the sole inclusion of GitHub as the contact information. If the project is indeed associated with Monero, its chances of success could be high. However, there remain unanswered questions regarding possibilities of exchange listings, multiple chain integration, and the prospects of a coin that the team is being targeted by the SEC and other regulatory agencies
